languages.text: "Право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш есть только у Эзирраеш. Ты дашь мне возможность прервать существование архонта Опустошительной бури".
"Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."
languages.original_text: "Право забрать жизнь Эзирраеш есть только у Эзирраеш. Ты дашь мне возможность прервать существование архонта Опустошительной бури".

traits.locale_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权夺走另一位艾泽拉什家族成员的性命。你得给我这个机会，让我亲手解决狂风阴谋团的执政官。”
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: “只有艾泽拉什家族的人，才有权夺走另一位艾泽拉什家族成员的性命。你得给我这个机会，让我亲手解决狂风阴谋团的执政官。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「アエジレシュだけがアエジレシュの命を奪う権利を持つ。お前は俺に、現存する略奪の嵐のアーコンを始末する機会をくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: 「アエジレシュだけがアエジレシュの命を奪う権利を持つ。お前は俺に、現存する略奪の嵐のアーコンを始末する機会をくれるだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Solo un Aezyrraesh tiene legítimo derecho a arrebatar la vida de otro Aezyrraesh. Me brindarás la oportunidad de poner fin a la existencia de la arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un Aezyrraesh tiene legítimo derecho a arrebatar la vida de otro Aezyrraesh. Me brindarás la oportunidad de poner fin a la existencia de la arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Seul un Aezyrraesh a le droit de tuer l'un des siens. Quand l'occasion se présentera d'abattre l'archonte de la Tempête ravageuse, vous vous effacerez et vous me laisserez faire. »
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: « Seul un Aezyrraesh a le droit de tuer l'un des siens. Quand l'occasion se présentera d'abattre l'archonte de la Tempête ravageuse, vous vous effacerez et vous me laisserez faire. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben eines Aezyrraesh zu beenden. Ihr werdet mir die Möglichkeit verschaffen, die Existenz der Archontin des plündernden Sturms auszulöschen."
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Aezyrraesh hat das Recht, das Leben eines Aezyrraesh zu beenden. Ihr werdet mir die Möglichkeit verschaffen, die Existenz der Archontin des plündernden Sturms auszulöschen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

languages.text: "Bir Aezyrraesh'in canını alma hakkı, yalnızca bir Aezyrraesh'e aittir. Bana Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu'nun varlığını sona erdirme şansını vereceksin."
languages.original_text: "Only an Aezyrraesh has the right to take the life of an Aezyrraesh. You will give me the chance to end the existence of the Archon of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Aezyrraesh'in canını alma hakkı yalnızca bir Aezyrraesh'e aittir. Bana Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu'nun varlığını sona erdirme şansını vereceksin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
